title: Should I buy an XGIMI H3 projector? - Quora

response.answer_text: ValueQ Team believes that the XGIMI H3 can be regarded as a new benchmark product in the smart projectors industry. First of all, its brightness reached 1900 ANSI lumens, which has not been seen in previous products. Secondly, thanks to X-VUE quality engine technology, its image quality, and color have also been fully improved. Third, GMUI3. 5 smart system is impeccable in terms of functions and content. XGIMI H3 Key Features Ultra-high brightness with peak brightness up to 1908 ANSI lumens X-VUE quality engine technology Non-inductive focus + fully automatic trapezoidal correction GMUI3.5 intelligent system, powerful and rich in resources How much is the XGIMI H3 smart projector In terms of price, the starting price of the XGIMI H3 smart projector is 4,999 yuan ($706). As a flagship product, this price is actually quite unexpected. Considering the excellent performance, we have believed that its price should be more than 6000 yuan ($847). Therefore, the price is still very affordable. Source: XGIMI H3 Smart Projector Review
